name.value: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Compendium

item.description:
Warcry: Compendium is your ultimate guide to assembling a Warcry warband to enter the depths of the Gnarlwood, accompanied by a powerful following of thralls, monsters, and allies. Within you will find a comprehensive list of rules for the second edition of Warcry, allowing you to command warriors from each of the Grand Alliances that dominate the Mortal Realms.

This 184-page softcover book is loaded with profiles and abilities for more than 40 existing warbands across all four Grand Alliances - the Sentinels of Order, Agents of Chaos, Bringers of Death, and Harbingers of Destruction - as well as the mighty allies, terrifying monsters, and bestial thralls that can be called upon to fight alongside them. These have all been updated for Warcry's second edition with balance adjustments, rules changes, and all-new Reactions to make your games even more dynamic and aggressive. It's everything you need to bring your existing collection into the Era of the Beast.

The warbands detailed in this book:

 Sentinels of Order: Cities of Sigmar, Daughters of Khaine, Khainite Shadowstalkers, Fyreslayers, Idoneth Deepkin, Kharadron Overlords, Lumineth Realm-lords, Seraphon, Sylvaneth, Thunderstrike Stormcast, Stormcast Eternals (Sacrosanct Chamber, Vanguard Auxiliary Chamber, and Warrior Chamber)
 Agents of Chaos: Blades of Khorne (Daemons and Bloodbound), Disciples of Tzeentch (Daemons and Arcanites), Maggotkin of Nurgle (Daemons and Rotbringers), Hedonites of Slaanesh (Daemons and Sybarites), Skaven, Slaves to Darkness, Iron Golems, Untamed Beasts, Corvus Cabal, Cypher Lords, The Unmade, Splintered Fang, Scions of the Flame, Spire Tyrants, Darkoath Savagers, and Tarantulos Brood
 Bringers of Death: Flesh-eater Courts, Nighthaunt, Ossiarch Bonereapers, and Soulblight Gravelords
 Harbingers of Destruction: Gloomspite Gitz, Gobbapalooza, Bonesplitterz, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz, and Ogor Mawtribes


—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
